name: The Place in Between
description:
"The Place In Between" is a short first-person exploration videogame in which you wander through a dark eerie place and unveil its secrets. It’s all about exploring, hearing, observing and feeling the space. Everything you will find in it will give you a hint on the mind and the story of its creator, in a non-linear and abstract way.

Credits

Design, Programming, Visuals and Sound Design & Composition by Filipe Baptista (@filipembaptista)

Audio Sources
"Spiegel im Spiegel”, composed by Arvo Part

Video Sources
"Smoke" (excerpt), choreographed by Mats Ek and performed by Sylvie Guillem and Niklas Ek

Special thanks to everyone who tested the project and  gave interesting and valuable insight.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Left Shift to sprint
  • Move mouse to look arround
  • Left Mouse Button to focus

Note 1: Currently there is no controller support, I’ll try to add it in the next build and upload a new version. For now, you can always configure your own controller in the game launcher, if you want to.

Note 2: It is highly recommended that you play the game with your headphones on, since the audio plays a major role in it.

Thank you for stopping by.
